summary: Contoso Wireless offers product streaming services for a monthly fee of $19.99 which includes unlimited access to movies, TV shows, and music. Payment can be made by major credit cards, PayPal, and Apple Pay, and customers can choose from monthly, quarterly, or annual plans. Long-term customers can receive a 10% discount when signing up for an annual plan. Customers should have an internet connection with speeds of at least 3 Mbps and use a compatible device such as a smart TV, computer, tablet, or mobile device with the Contoso Wireless app installed to access the content. Parental controls are also recommended if children are accessing the service.
